name: voice-router-dev
description: Universal speech-to-text router for Gladia, AssemblyAI, Deepgram, Azure, OpenAI Whisper, Speechmatics, and Soniox

scripts.build:all: pnpm build:types && pnpm build:bundle && pnpm build:docs
scripts.build:types: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Generating TypeScript types from OpenAPI specs...' && pnpm openapi:generate || echo 'âš ï¸  Type generation skipped (using existing types)'
scripts.openapi:sync: echo 'ðŸ”„ Syncing OpenAPI specs from remote sources...' && node scripts/sync-specs.js
scripts.openapi:sync:assemblyai: node scripts/sync-specs.js --provider assemblyai && node scripts/sync-specs.js --provider assemblyaiAsync
scripts.openapi:sync:speechmatics: node scripts/sync-specs.js --provider speechmatics && node scripts/sync-specs.js --provider speechmaticsAsync
scripts.openapi:fix-specs: node scripts/fix-openai-spec.js && node scripts/fix-speechmatics-spec.js && node scripts/fix-deepgram-spec.js
scripts.openapi:fix: node scripts/fix-generated.js && node scripts/fix-assemblyai-missing-schemas.js && sed -i "s/'\([a-z_]*\)\.'\([a-z_]*\)'/'\1.\2'/g" src/generated/speechmatics/api/speechmaticsASRRESTAPI.zod.ts 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.openapi:generate: pnpm openapi:fix-specs && pnpm openapi:clean && orval && pnpm openapi:sync-assemblyai-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-deepgram-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-deepgram-languages && pnpm openapi:sync-speechmatics-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-speechmatics-languages && pnpm openapi:sync-soniox-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-soniox-languages && pnpm openapi:sync-azure-locales && pnpm openapi:fix
scripts.openapi:generate:gladia: pnpm openapi:clean:gladia && orval --config orval.config.ts --project gladiaApi && orval --config orval.config.ts --project gladiaZod && pnpm openapi:fix
scripts.openapi:generate:assemblyai: pnpm openapi:clean:assemblyai && orval --config orval.config.ts --project assemblyaiApi && orval --config orval.config.ts --project assemblyaiZod && pnpm openapi:sync-assemblyai-streaming && pnpm openapi:fix
scripts.openapi:generate:deepgram: pnpm openapi:clean:deepgram && orval --config orval.config.ts --project deepgramApi && orval --config orval.config.ts --project deepgramZod && pnpm openapi:sync-deepgram-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-deepgram-languages && pnpm openapi:fix
scripts.openapi:generate:speechmatics: node scripts/fix-speechmatics-spec.js && orval --config orval.config.ts --project speechmaticsApi && orval --config orval.config.ts --project speechmaticsZod && pnpm openapi:sync-speechmatics-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-speechmatics-languages && pnpm openapi:fix
scripts.openapi:generate:soniox: pnpm openapi:clean:soniox && orval --config orval.config.ts --project sonioxApi && orval --config orval.config.ts --project sonioxZod && pnpm openapi:sync-soniox-streaming && pnpm openapi:sync-soniox-languages && pnpm openapi:fix
scripts.openapi:generate:csharp:gladia: pnpm openapi:fix:csharp:gladia && pnpm openapi:clean:csharp:gladia && openapi-generator-cli generate -i specs/gladia-openapi-csharp.json -g csharp -o ./generated-csharp/gladia --additional-properties=packageName=Gladia.SDK,targetFramework=net8.0,nullableReferenceTypes=true
scripts.openapi:rebuild: pnpm openapi:sync && pnpm openapi:generate && pnpm build
scripts.docs:generate: pnpm docs:clean && pnpm docs:generate:router && pnpm docs:generate:webhooks && pnpm docs:generate:gladia && pnpm docs:generate:assemblyai && pnpm docs:generate:deepgram && pnpm docs:generate:azure && pnpm docs:generate:openai && pnpm docs:generate:speechmatics
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm openapi:sync && pnpm openapi:validate && pnpm lint:fix && pnpm build
scripts.prebuild: pnpm openapi:fix-specs && pnpm openapi:fix && pnpm openapi:sync-soniox-languages && pnpm openapi:sync-speechmatics-languages && pnpm openapi:sync-azure-locales && pnpm openapi:sync-deepgram-languages

author: Lazare Zemliak <lazare@meetingbaas.com>
